data.title: Greg Bear – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Greg Bear. Browse Greg Bear’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
HALO: Primordium

HALO, Book 8

By: Greg Bear

Narrated by: Timothy Dadabo

Length: 8 hrs and 59 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,155

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 1,044

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,045

In the company of a young girl and an old man, Chakas begins an epic journey across a lost and damaged Halo ringworld in search of a way home, an explanation for the warrior spirits rising up within, and the reason for the Forerunner Librarian’s tampering with human destiny....

2 out of 5 stars

Can't stand the characters.

By Gannon Prather on 08-05-20

HALO: Cryptum

HALO, Book 7

By: Greg Bear

Narrated by: Holter Graham

Length: 8 hrs and 41 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,571

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,392

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,389

One hundred thousand years ago, the galaxy was populated by a great variety of beings. But one species - eons beyond all others in both technology and knowledge - achieved dominance. They ruled in peace but met opposition with quick and brutal effectiveness. And then they vanished....

5 out of 5 stars

Interesting take to the unwritten history.

By Layne Harper on 05-17-19

One hundred thousand years ago, Chaos rules the final days of the Forerunner empire. The Flood - a horrifying, shape-changing, and unstoppable parasite - has arrived in force, aided by unexpected allies, and internal strife has desperately weakened Forerunner defenses....

5 out of 5 stars

Out with a BANG!

By Joshua on 05-13-20
